channel.title: Sles on openQA bites
channel.description: Recent content in Sles on openQA bites

item.title: BCI test tutorial
item.author: felix.niederwanger@suse.de (phoenix)
item.description: Base Container Images (BCI) are a SUSE offer for a variety of container images suitable for building custom applications atop of the SUSE Linux Enterprise (SLE). They are a suitable building platform for different container applications and are available for free without subscription. In this blog post I’m covering how we test BCI before they are released and how you can run individual tests on them.

item.title: Run Azure images in Hyper-V or kvm
item.author: felix.niederwanger@suse.de (phoenix)
item.description: Disclaimer: This blog post is about SUSE Linux Enterprise Server images on Azure and probably only useful to SUSE Employees who work with such images.
